item.title: Longtime Clint Eastwood Producer Addresses Whether Juror #2 Will Be The Icon's Last Movie
item.description: Clint Eastwood’s longtime producer, Tim Moore, addresses whether the director's latest 2024 film, Juror #2, will be the movie icon's last.

item.title: What If Reacher was in the John Wick Universe?
item.description: Considering Reacher’s need to wander aimlessly, he could soon find himself inside John Wick’s universe.

item.title: Hayden Christensen Gives The Best Explanation For Revenge Of The Sith's Most Controversial Line
item.description: Hayden Christensen's explanation of this iconic Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi moment from Revenge of the Sith makes so much sense.
